p: Person correlation (r) indicated that there was a significant positive correlation between age and MIC of T. zygis oil ( r = 0.289, P < 0.05), a non-significant positive correlation between age and MIC of R. officinalis oil ( r = 0.213, P > 0.05) and a non-significant negative correlation between age and MIC of O. majorana oil ( r = âˆ’0.082, P > 0.05).
